dct_alternative_sm: Basutoland with part of Union of South Africa
Basutoland with part of Republic of South Africa
dct_description_sm: constructed, drawn and photographed by Directorate of Overseas Surveys.
Relief shown by contours and spot heights.
Some maps have title: Basutoland with part of Republic of South Africa ; some have title: Basutoland with part of Union of South Africa.
Mixed set: includes various editions and some maps are preliminary plot.
Some maps constructed by: Directorate of Colonial Surveys as part of series D.C.S. 21.
Includes boundary, magnetic declination and reliability diagrams and index to adjoining sheets.
dct_creator_sm: Great Britain, Directorate of Overseas Surveys.
Great Britain, Directorate of Colonial Surveys.
